text.content:
Phantasms follow a set of special rules.

  • Phantasms are entities of pure energy, capable of taking on various sizes and forms — even becoming exact replicas of you!

  • They do not talk or have a mind of their own, and are not capable or reason or logic.

  • They only follow simple one-clause commands and cannot abstract meaning or extrapolate from them. For example, if you ask a Phantasm to grab some milk, it knows where the milk is because you do. It also knows that you are feeling thirsty — because you know it too. However, it won't understand that milk can quench thirst, nor will it know to pour the milk into a glass; these thought processes are too complex for Phantasms. So, it would just bring you the whole bottle of milk, with a deadpan look.

  • Phantasms share your base Attributes and Defenses, have no MP, and their Phantasmal Vitality (PV) is equal to your base Insight die size plus your level. They have Immunity to all status eﬀects.

  • They have no Initiative score. Phantasms do not get a turn during conﬂicts, but on your turn, you can perform an action to command one or more Phantasms, depending on the wording of the spell. Phantasms always target Magical Defense.

  • You may create a Phantasm and command it in the same action. After this first command — which directly follows its creation — on your next turn, it requires a whole action to be commanded again. Therefore, you cannot command Phantasm 1 and then proceed to create Phantasm 2 in the same action.

  • Unless stated otherwise, you can have up to 3 Phantasms active at the same time. Attempts to cast more Phantasms beyond 3 will fail.

  • Your Phantasms shatter if they fall to 0 PV, if you fall to 0 HP, or if you leave the scene. You can also shatter them through skills, spells, or at will.

Spells marked with ( @ICON[offensive] ) are offensive spells and require Magic Checks!

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Wo9Ox5SebLFF0M6V]{Create Phantasm: Dread} @ICON[offensive]10One creatureScene

You may spend one action to conjure a terrifying Phantasm. Choose either weaken or shaken: the Phantasm inflicts the chosen status effect on the target hit by this spell. On any subsequent turn, you may spend an action and roll another Magic Check to command the Phantasm to inflict the effects again, with no MP requirements.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.jgu28rsxgmz1derC]{Create Phantasm: Mockery} @ICON[offensive]10One creatureScene

You may spend one action to create a vexing Phantasm that taunts and distracts your foe. For the next Attack action, if the target rolls an even number for Accuracy Check, the attack misses. On any subsequent turn, you may spend an action and roll another Magic Check to command the Phantasm to taunt again, with no MP requirements.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.9Eu50hBASZZGgSXI]{Create Phantasm: Strike} @ICON[offensive]10One creatureInstantaneous

You may spend one action to create a Phantasm and command it to attack an enemy. The target hit by the Phantasm suffers 【HR + 12】 damage. This damage increases to 16 if you are level 20 or higher, or to 18 if you are level 40 or higher.

The range of the attack is determined by your current weapon. On any subsequent turn, you may spend an action and roll another Magic Check to command the Phantasm to attack again, with no MP requirements. Damage dealt by this spell ignores resistances.

You overflow one Phantasm with energy, making it explode to devastating effect. Choose a damage type: light or dark. The target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 25】 damage of the chosen type. This shatters the Phantasm.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.g3c8KaRPro7JObQ9]{Essence Sacrifice}10 × TUp to three alliesInstantaneous

You command your Phantasms to replenish your allies' Mind Points. Each Phantasm runs towards a companion and shatters itself in a spray of mana. Each target recovers 20 Mind Points. A single ally cannot be replenished by more than one Phantasm per action.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.B20KHs7V7mMvN0T0]{Illusory Shield}

20

One creature

Instantaneous

When another creature is threatened by an attack, spell, or other danger, command one Phantasm to take their place. Any Checks that are part of the danger will be performed against the Phantasm. The Phantasm shields the creature, taking an amount of damage corresponding to how much PV it has left, until it shatters. The remaining damage goes to the creature being defended. All status effects related to the attack are nullified.

You command all your Phantasms to charge at a single enemy with incredible speed, shattering on impact. They all share a single Magic Check. If they hit, the target suffers 【HR + 10】 physical damage per Phantasm and the dazed effect. Damage dealt by this spell ignores resistances. This amount increase by 15 if you are level 20 or higher, or by 20 if you are level 40 or higher.

You create an illusion that makes your companions feel healthier and refreshed for a while. For their next 3 turns, they gain 40 additional HP this increases both their maximum and their current HP by 40. This amount increases to 50 HP if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 HP if you are level 40 or higher. After 3 turns, they lose this additional HP. If reduced to 0 HP at the end of the spell, the Sacrifice and Surrender rules apply as normal.
